source.name: Hemi.worker
source.package:
Hemi.worker Hemi The worker is a managed wrapper for the HTML 5 DOM Worker. Hemi Worker implements the Hemi Module service to inject the target worker script with the Module API, add a lightweight Psuedo Worker API for browsers that don't support Worker, and add a bootstrap to browsers that do support Worker so the Worker runs in the Hemi framework. Inside worker Add Hemi framework
service 3.5.1 Static implementation of the hemi.worker.serviceImpl class.
serviceImpl 3.5.1 The worker service provides a wrapper for adding the Hemi Module API to Worker scripts, and adding a lightweight wrapper for browsers that don't support Workers.
PsuedoWorker A lightweight Worker implementation. Includes all FrameworkObject members.
onmessage Invoked by the Worker via the postMessage method.
postMessage Data to post to the worker. Posts the specified message to the Worker. Note: The wrapper does not currently convert objects into JSON notation.
NewWorker Path to the script which the worker will process. XHTML Component acting as a container for the module. A Worker or PsuedoWorker object.. Creates a new Worker or PsuedoWorker object, depending on browser support.
oW.onmessage = this._prehandle_worker;

index.description: The worker is a managed wrapper for the HTML 5 DOM Worker. Hemi Worker implements the service to inject the target worker script with the Module API, add a lightweight Psuedo Worker API for browsers that don't support Worker, and add a bootstrap to browsers that do support Worker so the Worker runs in the Hemi framework.
